attributes.action: Repayment of  bailed out banks debts priority to  repay before bonus payouts to any staff.
attributes.additional_details:
In times of economic  crisis and recession  when unemployment is  high and everyone is suffering from severe cutbacks  any bank, businesses or organisation that has been financially bailed out with public funds has the responsibilty and moral duty to  repay that debt  to the public as soon as possible.

Therefore I  propose that their staff, at all levels, receive no financial bonus, or  equivalent payment in kind, until the debt to  the public is repaid in full.

This would demonstrate to the public the integrity and earnestness of   their ( bank, business or organisation)  duty. Leading to regaining  public support, respect and trust.
